name: Trick For Treats
description:
Play as a little ghoul who is hungry for sweets. But be careful: the people in this town are a paranoid folk. In order to get his hands on that tasty candy, our protagonist must disguise himself as a trick or treater. And it's up to you, the player, to keep him out of trouble and his disguise intact

Avoid hazards by pressing W to jump. Hold down W for longer jumps.
